mapper.select: select count(*) from (SELECT C1.mem_id AS memId, A.MVCRP_ID AS mvcrpId, B.MVC_CONTENT AS mvcContent, C1.mem_email AS mvcMemEmail, C2.mem_email AS rpMemEmail, A.MVCRP_CONTENT AS mvcrpContent FROM mvcreport A JOIN moviecomment B ON A.mvc_id = B.mvc_id JOIN member C1 ON B.mem_id = C1.mem_id JOIN member C2 ON A.mem_id = C2.mem_id WHERE A.mvcrp_yn = 'N' ORDER BY A.MVCRP_ID DESC)

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT C1.mem_id as memId, A.MVCRP_ID as mvcrpId, rpad(SUBSTR(B.MVC_CONTENT, 1, 25),50,'...') AS mvcContent, C1.mem_email as mvcMemEmail, C2.mem_email as rpMemEmail, A.MVCRP_CONTENT as mvcrpContent FROM mvcreport A JOIN moviecomment B ON A.mvc_id = B.mvc_id JOIN member C1 ON B.mem_id = C1.mem_id JOIN member C2 ON A.mem_id = C2.mem_id WHERE A.mvcrp_yn = 'N' ORDER BY A.MVCRP_ID DESC ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) A WHERE RNUM >= #{start}
